Class SchemaAnalysis

java.lang.Object
  kdl.prox.db.SchemaAnalysis

public class SchemaAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object

This class retrieves summary information about the schema of the database.

getLinkConnectedObjStats

public java.util.Set getLinkConnectedObjStats(java.lang.String linkTypeAttrVal)
Gets a set of objects which contain summary information for each (object 1 type, link type, object 2 type) triple that exists for this link type. Summary information includes the number of links of this type which go between objects of the first type and objects of the second type, and is provided in a LinkStats object.

Parameters:
linkTypeAttrVal - type of link
Returns:
set of LinkStats objects with information about the objects at the ends of this type of link

getLinkConnectedObjStatsAsStringSet

public java.util.Set getLinkConnectedObjStatsAsStringSet(java.lang.String linkTypeAttrVal)
Returns the linkConnectedObjStats as a set of StringsS Each string contains objFrom -> objTo (int(pct)%)

Parameters:
linkTypeAttrVal -
